name: Immolation
description:
You are a young Sunbird embarking on the Immolation. Do not fear death, for it will serve to guide you where you need to go.

Controls Reference:
  • A, D = move left and right
  • W = Jump
  • Left Mouse = throw Fire
  • Escape = Pause
Credits
  • Aidan Bauer: Gameplay Programmer, Concept, UI
  • Zach Singer: Gameplay Programmer
  • Earl Procko: Art, Animation
  • Ron Burgess: Programmer, Concept Design
